text: A La Carte Communications is a television production company founded in 1990 by Natan Katzman and Geoffrey Drummond. A la Carte produced Jeff Smith's The Frugal Gourmet cooking show. Other shows produced by the company included Julia Child: Cooking with Master Chefs and In Julia's Kitchen with Master Chefs. A La Carte and Maryland Public Television co-produced the Emmy award- winning series Baking with Julia. == References == Category:Television producers Category:1990 establishments
title: A La Carte Communications
